ca.nengo.ui.lib.util.menus

Class AbstractMenuBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.nengo.ui.lib.util.menus.AbstractMenuBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuBuilder, PopupMenuBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractMenuBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to build a menu. The created menu can later be converted to a Swing component.
